placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Тайланд: осенние приключения ждут!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "a body of water surrounded by mountains and trees". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
